b.style: color: rgb(255, 102, 102); font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);

br.b:
GOV. JUSTICE HAS CLOSED SCHOOLS FOR THE YEAR
Distance learning and meal deliveries will continue through May

a.b: New Instructional Packets Have Been Posted

span.style: margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-weight: inherit; font-style: inherit; font-size: 11pt; vertical-align: baseline; font-family: inherit;

br.span: For Hampshire County School District announcements about virus procedures, the district's response to the situation and important issues that need responses by students, parents or staff members - please read the Announcements at the bottom of the page

span.style: margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-weight: inherit; font-size: 11pt; vertical-align: baseline; font-family: inherit;
span.i: (click to see them all as there may be too many to show on the front page at once)

span.style: margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-weight: inherit; font-style: inherit; font-size: 11pt; vertical-align: baseline; font-family: inherit;

br.span: and/or the Hampshire County Schools Facebook page at:

span.style: margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-size: 13px;

span.a: 2020-21 Calendar selected by the Hampshire County Board of Education - (awaiting state approval

div.div: Fri, Mar. 13 - Fri, May 29 Schools Closed for Virus Pandemic - Online Learning
Mon, May 4 Board of Education Meeting
Mon, May 18 Board of Education Meeting
Mon, May 25 Memorial Day Holiday
Mon, June 1 Board of Education Meeting
Tue, June 9 Primary Election Day
Sat, June 20 WV Day Holiday
Mon, June 22 Board of Education Meeting
Sat, July 4 Independence Day Holiday (4th of July)
Mon, Aug. 10 - Thu, Aug. 13 20-21 Curriculum Development Days for Staff
Fri, Aug. 14 20-21 Staff Preparation for Opening of Schools
Mon, Aug. 17 20-21 FIRST DAY of SCHOOL for STUDENTS

table.style: margin: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; background: url(/images/layout/design21/halertbkg2.gif) right repeat-y top; padding-bottom: 30px; margin-top: 6px;

div.a: ATTN - Romney Elementary Krispy Creme Sale Cancelled - Refunds Being Processed
div.div: Refunds will be given to those who "sold" the donuts to return them to the buyers. Any buyer who wants their refund to go directly back to them, please call 304-822-3018 or email cynthia.morris@k12.wv.us and leave name, address and person ordered from.

div.a: ATTN: Survey for 5th Grade Students who will be attending CBMS or RMS in the fall
div.div: All 5th grade students in Hampshire County who will be attending Capon Bridge Middle School or Romney Middle School next year should complete this survey regarding the music electives they wish to take in 6th grade. Read on...

Kindergarten registration is only for those students NOT currently enrolled in PK PK Students must be 4 yrs old PRIOR to July 1, 2020 Kindergarten students must be 5 yrs old PRIOR to July 1, 2020 Call 304-822-3528, ext. 141 to register Additional Info...

div.a: IMPORTANT - MIDDLE & HIGH SCHOOL FAMILIES MAY NOW QUALIFY FOR FREE/REDUCED MEALS
NEW Student Engagement Instructional Packets, Grading Guidelines & Drop-off/Pick-Up Times Available
div.div:
Hampshire County has new work packets beginning April 20 for all grades.
WVDE has also compiled a list of resources for parents & educators to use with students - https://wvde.us/covid19/resources/ Read on for more information and links......

div.a: It's Open Enrollment for Employee Health, Vision & Dental Insurance through May 15
div.div: Employees may make changes to their insurance coverage - but act quickly because of many offices being closed or working reduced hours. See Employee Benefits & contact Rhonda Park...

div.a: Marion Herriott, Bobby Hott & Romney Rotary Scholarship Application Deadlines Extended at HHS

div.div:
Hampshire County GoldenHorseshoe Winners Announced. Congratulations to these students for their hard work.
Mulledy Jane Cook - Capon Bridge Middle School Gavin Hall - Capon Bridge Middle School Conner Wolford - Home School

div.style: float: left; width: 189; background: transparent; margin-top: 6px;
